TopicTitle: Circles from sun on kerbal sky

Articles.Content:
Hi!

what the lines? on clear and modded install (

pc i7, 8gb, gt650

win8 x64

![xKlVDFu.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/xKlVDFu.jpg)

how to treat this? ((
have you ever tried to install scatterer?, if so make sure it is completely uninstalled or try turning off antialiasing

Hi! 

Scatterer not install...

but write to commandline of shortcut (on desctop) "-forceOpenGL" )

Erase this few letter and all good!

tnx!!
-force-opengl is broken in Unity3D 4.6.4, which is what we're on, some people have gotten it to work, see the threads on that subject.
